footer.description: Bringing classic geometric puzzles to the modern web. Play, learn, and create.

area1.text3: Explore timeless geometric puzzles in a modern, interactive environment. Challenge your mind, unleash creativity.

area2.text2: Two classic puzzle types, reimagined for the digital age
area2.text4: An ancient Chinese geometric puzzle consisting of seven flat polygons called tans. Arrange these pieces to form specific shapes and silhouettes without overlapping. With over 6,500 possible arrangements, Tangram tests spatial reasoning and creativity.
area2.text6: Geometric shapes formed by connecting equal-sized squares edge to edge. From dominos (2 squares) to more complex forms, these puzzles challenge you to fill grids and create patterns. Perfect for developing logical thinking and spatial awareness.

area3.text5: Select from hundreds of shape silhouettes ranging from simple to expert difficulty.
area3.text7: Drag, rotate, and flip the seven tans to match the target shape. All pieces must be used.
area3.text9: Pieces must fit perfectly without overlapping. Get hints if you're stuck!
area3.text12: Choose a grid size and set of polyomino pieces for your puzzle challenge.
area3.text14: Fit the polyomino shapes into the grid. Rotate pieces and plan your strategy carefully.
area3.text16: New puzzles every day to keep your mind sharp and engaged.

area4.text2: The perfect blend of fun, education, and creativity
area4.text4: Smooth drag-and-drop controls with instant feedback. Play seamlessly on any device.
area4.text6: Enhance spatial reasoning, problem-solving, and geometric thinking through play.
area4.text8: Create your own puzzles and patterns. Share solutions with the community.
area4.text10: Clean, modern interface with smooth animations and delightful interactions.
area4.text12: From beginner to expert levels. Track your progress and unlock achievements.
area4.text14: New puzzles every day to keep your mind sharp and engaged.

area5.text2: Join thousands of puzzle enthusiasts and start your geometric adventure today. No signup required.
